# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="85eef-102">Spremanje poruke u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="85eef-103">Poruka e-pošte nije moguće spremiti u Outlook.com, ali možete ih ispisati PDF koji možete spremiti na Računalu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="85eef-104">Uslužni program Microsoft ispisa za PDF uključeni u Windows 10 omogućuje ispis bilo koju poruku e-pošte izravno u PDF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="85eef-105">Odaberite poruku na koju želite spremiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="85eef-106">Odaberite tri točkice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="85eef-107">na vrhu poruka i zatim odaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="85eef-108">**Ispis**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="85eef-109">Odaberite **Ispis** i iz padajućeg izbornika pisača odaberite **Ispis Microsoft u PDF**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="85eef-110">Odaberite **Ispis**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="85eef-111">Unesite naziv datoteke, a zatim odaberite **Spremi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="85eef-112">**Napomena:** To se ne preporučuje na javno ili računalima kao drugim korisnicima može imati pristup svaki PDF spremite na računalo i nemojte izbrisati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="85eef-113">Dodatne informacije o ispisu potražite [Ispis poruke e-pošte, privitke, i kalendare u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85eef-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
